name: Wild Dash Soccer Cup
description:
Kick the ball and run on the seemingly endless road towards world football success! Make a mad dash while avoiding crazy obstacles and answering map trivia along the way in this wacky running game designed to challenge your skills, reflexes, and knowledge of countries and flags.

Take a wild and wacky trip alongside your team of cute and sporty animal pals: Arno Armadillo, Brock Bull, Rory Lion, Webley Duck, and Fritz Frog. Jump, slide, and glide around obstacles. Grab coins to spend on upgrades, and special power-ups to give you an edge. Brush up on geography as you solve quizzes that will test your knowledge in different national flags of the world, and get rewarded with bonus life in return.

Gameplay:
Tilt your device to steer left/right
Swipe up to jump
Swipe down to slide under obstacles
Swipe left or right to make a turn
Answer the questions on Geography correctly to win extra lives

Features:
- Excellent endless running gameplay to help sharpen your reflexes
- Numerous map trivia to test your knowledge of countries flags
- Dash through 4 different locations
- Collect gold coins to spend on various powerful upgrades
- Equip your team with different national jerseys
- Unlock 4 other cute characters to run with
- Endure the run and unlock more areas on the map
- Pick up power-ups to help you last longer

**While this app is free, please be aware that it contains optional paid content. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings. **
